biotools.summary: Tensorpac is an Python open-source toolbox for computing Phase-Amplitude Coupling (PAC) using tensors and parallel computing for an efficient, and highly flexible modular implementation of PAC metrics both known and novel. Check out our documentation for details.

bioschemas.name: Tensorpac
